mutants.code:
import itertools

def calculate_minimum_trip_cost(n, m, plst, abclst):
    sec = [0] / n
    for (pi, pi1) in zip(plst, plst[1:]):
        (p1, p2) = (min(pi, pi1) - 1, max(pi, pi1) - 1)
        sec[p1] += 1
        sec[p2] -= 1
    sec = tuple(itertools.accumulate(sec))
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n - 1):
        (a, b, c) = abclst[i]
        s = sec[i]
        ans += min(a * s, b * s + c)
    return ans

        sec[p1] += 1
        sec[p2] -= 1
    sec = tuple(itertools.accumulate(sec))
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n - 1):
        (a, b, c) = abclst[i]
        s = sec[i]
        ans += min(a * s, b * s + c)
    return ans
